import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import './About.css'; import './Bakery.css'; import about1 from './Images/Bakery3.jpg'; import about2 from './Images/bakery.jpg'; import about3 from './Images/Bakery4.jpg'; import home15 from './Images/upload.png'; import logo from './Images/what.jpg'; import pastry from './Images/download.png'; import heart from './Images/icons8-heart-32.png'; import honesty from './Images/trustworthiness.png'; import cupcake from './Images/icons8-cup-cake-64.png'; function About(){ // State to track scroll position const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false); // Function to handle scroll event const handleScroll = () => { if (window.scrollY > 300) { setIsVisible(true); // Show button after scrolling 300px } else { setIsVisible(false); // Hide button when at the top } }; // Scroll to top function const scrollToTop = () => { window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth', // Smooth scrolling effect }); }; // useEffect to listen to the scroll event useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => { window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); // Cleanup on component unmount }; }, []); return( <>

Theobroma means 'Food of the Gods' in Greek, befitting our exclusive and indulgent range of
offerings that include brownies, cakes, desserts, chocolates, breads, and savouries.

From our humble beginnings in 2004, when the first Theobroma pastry store opened its doors at
the iconic Cusrow Baug at Colaba Causeway (Mumbai), we've grown to become a Pan-India
chain of patisseries with stores in over 30 cities.

Our mission is to spread happiness by serving smiles on a plate, and this journey continues as we
open Theobroma patisseries across the country.

Our Promise

AUTHENTIC RECIPES

Our products are based on
ontraditional home-style recipes
using fresh ingredients.

BAKED WITH LOVE

Our passion for baking is poured into
every recipe, serving smiles on a
plate everyday.

HONESTLY PRICED

We constantly strive to offer
the bestproducts at the
right prices.

COMMITTED TO QUALITY

From our ingredients to our
kitchen operations & guest services,
we always prioritize quality.

Like Our Product ?

Treat yourself to your favourite Delight products or surprise your loved ones with an edible gift.
